remarks: A consequence of the relative atomicity of Hilbert space: the ordering of Hilbert lattice elements is completely determined by the atoms they majorize.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
chrelat3.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
chrelat3.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
chrelat3i $p |- ( A C_ B <-> A. x e. HAtoms ( x C_ A -> x C_ B ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
